name: T - Lily Natalia
_source: speak;Natalia; Wow Lily, your magic's so strong{tgm}...{tgm}{w} You remind me of some of my sisters at the church back home.
speak;Lily; You said your town was destroyed by bandits, right?

speak;Natalia; Yeah{tgm}...{tgm} They came one day without warning.{w} They didn't even demand anything or give us a choice.{w} They just took what they wanted and destroyed the rest.{w} My fellow sisters resisted, so{tgm}...{tgm}{w} The bandits didn't want them anymore.

speak;Lily; Oh heavens{tgm}...{tgm} That sounds like torture{tgm}...{tgm}{w} My own town was razed by demons,{w} and I had to watch my friends and fellow clerics turn into grotesque shadows of themselves.
speak;Natalia; The world's been plunged into such despair{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Sometimes I wonder if there's still a shred of salvation for this world{tgm}...

speak;Lily; If there's something I've learned,{w} it's that you can't worry about what you think.{w} You've just got to believe that there's still a better tomorrow.{w} Heh, maybe after all this time, Emma's rubbed off on me after all.
speak;Natalia; I just don't understand how you could think so happily you've lived through hell{tgm}...
speak;Lily; Dwelling on the past just opens old wounds{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Let's focus on helping our friends we have with us right now.
